## Regular Expressions I

* ^ 시작
* $ 끝
* [] 
* [0-9][a-zA-Z]

```{r}
texts <- c("i like basketballs.", "6 and 9", "don't worry... we all die anyway!",
           "Not in Baghdad", "helicopter under water? hmm")
grep("[^?.]$", texts)
```
